info.title: Cakemail API
info.description: The Cakemail API exposes multiple APIs including Authentication, Marketing, Contact, Transactional, Analytic, Content, Account and Partner.

reply_to_email.title: reply_to_email
reply_to_email.description: Specify a different reply-to email address than the sender

DoubleOptIn.title: DoubleOptIn
DoubleOptIn.description:
Default: 'false'

Send a double opt-in/confirmation email
  - __new__ : send only if the email is new to the list
  - __not_active__ : send only if the contact is not already active
  - __true__ : send the email regardless of contact status
  - __false__ : do not send the email

group_id.title: group_id
group_id.description: Allows you to group multiple transaction emails together for analytics

opens.title: opens
opens.description: Enable the tracking of opens (only available for the HTML version)

clicks_html.title: clicks_html
clicks_html.description: Enable the tracking of link clicks in the HTML version

clicks_text.title: clicks_text
clicks_text.description: Enable the tracking of link clicks in the text version
